casebody.data:
The People of the State of Illinois, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Zachary L. Smith, Defendant-Appellant.(No. 73-67;Fifth DistrictMarch 20, 1974.

CREBS, J., took no part.

Robert E. Farrell, Deputy Defender, of Mt. Vernon (Theodore A. Gottfried, Assistant Appellate Defender, of counsel), for appellant.John H. Ward, State’s Attorney, of Taylorville (James W. Jerz and Martin P. Moltz, both of Model District State’s Attorneys Office, of counsel), for the People. PER CURIAM.
